verbs.description: [ARG1: The First Lady 's new wax figure] [V: stands] [ARG2: by President Donald Trump 's] [ARGM-LOC: in the Madame Tussauds New York City museum] . Former White House Press Secretary was there to
The First Lady 's new wax figure stands by President Donald Trump 's in the Madame Tussauds New York City museum . [ARG1: Former White House Press Secretary] [V: was] [ARG2: there] [ARGM-PRP: to]
